abstract: The Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater will present the world premiere of Rennie Harris’s “Exodus” in June.

headline.main: New Rennie Harris Work in Alvin Ailey Dance Season
headline.print_headline: Ailey to Offer New Work by Rennie Harris

snippet: The Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater will present the world premiere of Rennie Harris’s “Exodus” in June.
